metadata.purpose: Track all methodological adaptations for S&T extension to 1990-2025
metadata.principle: Document every divergence from original S&T methodology

surplus_product_SP.original_definition: As defined in S&T 1994, likely corporate profits plus adjustments
surplus_product_SP.modern_adaptation: TBD - map to BEA NIPA corporate profits tables
surplus_product_SP.data_source: BEA NIPA Tables (TBD which specific tables)

capital_stock_K.original_definition: S&T capital stock series, KK (1958-1973) union K (1974-1989)
capital_stock_K.modern_adaptation: TBD - map to BEA Fixed Assets Tables

capacity_utilization_u.modern_adaptation: Federal Reserve G.17 Capacity Utilization data
divergences: Fed data may use different industry aggregation than S&T
capacity_utilization_u.data_source: Federal Reserve G.17 Industrial Production and Capacity Utilization

surplus_rate_s_prime.original_definition: Rate of surplus value as calculated by S&T
surplus_rate_s_prime.modern_adaptation: TBD - derive from SP and variable capital estimates
surplus_rate_s_prime.data_source: Derived from SP and employment/wage data

organic_composition_c_prime.original_definition: Ratio of constant capital to variable capital per S&T
organic_composition_c_prime.modern_adaptation: TBD - derive from capital stock and employment data
organic_composition_c_prime.data_source: Derived from capital stock and employment data

price_deflation.modern_method: TBD - use current BEA chain-weighted indices or fixed-weight
price_deflation.impact: Affects real vs nominal variable calculations

base_year_choice.modern_method: TBD - maintain consistency or adapt to modern conventions

industry_aggregation.original_method: S&T industry categories based on 1980s SIC
industry_aggregation.modern_method: NAICS-based aggregation as per correspondence mapping
industry_aggregation.rationale: Required due to classification system changes

validation_requirements.description: Verify modern methodology produces similar results for overlap period (if any)
Check for artificial breaks at 1989-1990 transition
Ensure r = SP/(K*u) identity holds in extended data
Verify industry mappings produce sensible aggregate results
